reasoning: Secondary hypothyroidism (pituitary/hypothalamic origin) represents 1-5% of all hypothyroidism cases. Using prevalence metric as this is a chronic condition. Global hypothyroidism prevalence ~2.5%, of which secondary accounts for ~3% = ~1,100 per 100k.
source: Chaker L et al. (2017). Hypothyroidism. Nat Rev Dis Primers. 3:17071
